title: shrI raamachandranukku
sahitya:
shrI rAmacandranukku jaya mangaLam nall divya mukha candranukku



shubha mangaLam 



(shrI)







anupallavi







mArAbhirAmanukku mannu parandAmanukku IrAru nAmanukku



ravikula sOmanukku 



(shrI)







caraNam 1







koNDal manivaNNanukku kaNNanukku mangaLam kOshalai kumAranukku



vIranukku mangaLam



puNDarIkat-tALanukku bhUcakra Alanukku taNDuvaLa tOLanukku



jAnakI maNAlanukku 



(shrI)







caraNam 2







kOvai maNi vAyanukku mAyanukku mangaLam kOdaNDa kaiyanukku



meyyanukku mangaLam



tAvu guNashIlanukku sattiya vishAlanukku dEvar anukUlanukku



dasharathan bAlanukku 



(shrI)







caraNam 3







bhagIraNDa nAthanukku vEdanukku mangaLam bharatanAm anbanukku



munbanukku mangaLam



sakala ulhAsanukku taru mandahAsanukku akhila vishAlanukku



ayOdhyA vAsanukku 



(shrI)
